rightSidebar.secondParagraph: My name is Ivan and I do frontend development with a solid background in engineering.
rightSidebar.thirdParagraph: I love building interactive user experiences on the web.
rightSidebar.fourthParagraph: I believe as engineers we can create things that could potentially change the world for the better.

rightSidebar.fourthParagraph: Optimization and improvement of web application performance;
rightSidebar.sixthParagraph: Working with version control system Git.
